import { useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import './cartManage.css' import Item from './item' export default function CartManage () { const navigate = useNavigate() const products = useLocation().state let totalPrice = 0 products.forEach(item => { totalPrice += item.price * item.cartQuantity }) return (
